document_data.name: ''A Warrior's Views''
document_data.author: [[Galgarr Thormspur]]
document_data.Contents:
''A Warrior's Views'' was a collection of musings of Galgarr Thormspur, Marshal of [[Maligh]]. He expressed his opinions on poor career choices among many [[adventurer]]s in the Realms.

A copy of ''A Warrior's Views'' was kept in the library-citadel of [[Candlekeep]] in the late-14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite web/The Candlekeep Collection}}
